lines.text:
[stabs a policeman in the ear with a pencil]
Cop-kabob!

[singing]
Hey, there comes Johnny with his pecker in his hand, he's a one-balled man and he's off to the rodeo.
[cuts to graveyard scene and then back to squad car]

[singing]
So allamande left and allamande right, come on you fuckin' turkey get your right foot right. Get off the stage you fucking jerk, you know you piss me off.
What?
Cold Draft.
Could you use one right now?

[They get into a yard full of cats]
There's a lot of cats.
Well, I can see that, dickhead.
This doesn't have to hurt. Just think of yourself as lunch!
[Tanya hits him in the head with her camera]
I lied! It does have to hurt!
Stop looking at me! Stop looking at me you fucking cat!
No vegetables, no dessert - that's the rules.
Look, you got one hysterical girl with a very vivid imagination and all that girl needs is a good smack on the butt and her mommy and daddy won't do it, I'll be happy to volunteer.

[after hearing a door close]
Maybe it was the wind?
It was not the fucking wind.

[after smashing their heads together]
You're right. It was not the fucking wind.
Shit, Clovis.
[hears Clovis meow at dim Charles Brady]
I know just how you feel.
